scripts.build:staging: npm run build && node -e "const {staging} = require('./dist/config/staging'); console.log(JSON.stringify(staging, null, 2));"
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && node -e "const {prod} = require('./dist/config/prod'); console.log(JSON.stringify(prod, null, 2));"
scripts.build:base: npm run build && node -e "const {base} = require('./dist/config/base'); console.log(JSON.stringify(base, null, 2));"
